headline: A Look At Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Valuation After Morgan Stanley’s Rare Double Upgrade
summary: Morgan Stanley’s rare double upgrade has pushed Akamai Technologies (AKAM) into the spotlight, as the firm shifted its rating from underweight to overweight and highlighted improving fundamentals across delivery, security, and compute. See our latest analysis for Akamai Technologies. At a share price of US$91.27, Akamai’s 90 day share price return of 23.89% and 30 day share price return of 6.28% point to building momentum. However, the 1 year total shareholder return of 0.76% and 5 year total...

headline: How Morgan Stanley’s Double Upgrade At Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Morgan Stanley recently issued a rare double upgrade on Akamai Technologies, shifting its rating from underweight to overweight and highlighting the company’s evolving mix of content delivery, security, and compute services as it pivots toward higher-value cloud and cybersecurity offerings. This shift in analyst stance underscores how Akamai’s transition beyond its traditional content delivery network roots is reshaping perceptions of its role in security, edge computing, and infrastructure...

headline: Is Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Pricing In Its DCF Upside And Mixed Share Performance?
summary: If you are wondering whether Akamai Technologies' current share price fairly reflects its potential, you are not alone. This article focuses squarely on what you might be paying for compared with what you are getting. The stock last closed at US$91.27, with recent returns of 2.9% over 7 days, 6.3% over 30 days, 7.3% year to date, 0.8% over 1 year, 2.7% over 3 years and a 17.0% decline over 5 years. Taken together, these figures give a mixed picture of how the market has been reassessing the...
